term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - charge number, in inorganic nomenclature
term.title: charge number

item.text: The magnitude of the charge on an ion, given in arabic numerals followed by the sign of the charge, in parentheses without a space, immediately after the name of an ion, e.g. iron(2+), hexacyanoferrate(4−).

notes.item: The term Ewens–Bassett number is no longer recommended.
